name: STRATORUNNER
description:
The year is 2300. A mysterious robotic space force has attacked humanity. And only one ace pilot stands in their way:

STRATO RUNNER...

------------

This is a prototype of a bullet-hell shooter I'm working on, with a 16-bit retro aesthetic. Right now, only the first level is included, and a few features (like settings) aren't yet functional. This demo includes 7 different enemies, tons of waves, and a boss.

------------

Controls: mouse to move, space to fire, and A for shields. Pick up coins to refill your shield. Currently you can't rebind controls, but that will be added in future releases.

------------

CREDITS:

Programming, graphics: me

Font: Coder's Crux by Andrew McCluskey

HLSL RNG function: Keijiro Takahashi

Music: Supernatural (Alex Beroza), Drive Fast (Three Chain Links), Andrew Anime (urmymuse)

Give it a download!
